title: Gone up north for a while
creator_credit: Paul Maunder, Ronald Bowie and New Zealand National Film Unit
brief_description: A girl finds herself pregnant. She has no hope of marriage but knows that when her baby comes she will not give it up. She doesn’t know, but soon finds out, that society has no real place for her, and no understanding of the special needs of the unmarried mother and her child.
creator_credit_for_label: Paul Maunder, Ronald Bowie and New Zealand National Film Unit
